name: Association for Natural Medicine in Europe
goal: The Association for Natural Medicine in Europe e. V. is a coalition of organizations, manufacturers, foundations, professionals of health prevention and individuals in Europe who are active in the areas of naturopathy, traditional medicine, non-conventional medicine, complementary methods and alternative medicine as well as in health literacy and salutogenesis for human beings and animals. The mentioned units have been groped under the acronym “CAM”. It is used for coordination and common safeguarding of interests of CAM in the European and national policy
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
ENVI-Pharmaceutical Committee
European Safty and Food Agency-Stakeholder Forum
European Health Program 2014-2020
Contacts to DG-Research, DG-Education and DG SANTE
CAM-Interestgroup in the EP
EU-Health Policy Platform
European Patients Forum
